医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
产前接触皮质类固醇和 β2 激动剂的时间是否会影响孩子 3 岁时的神经发育？研究人员调查了子宫内接触 β2 激动剂和皮质类固醇的时间与后代生命最初三年神经发育里程碑之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Does-the-timing-of-prenatal-exposure-to-corticosteroids-and-ceb22-agonists-impact-a-childs-neurodevelopment-by-age- 3.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Does-the-timing-of-prenatal-exposure-to-corticosteroids-and-ceb22-agonists-impact-a-childs-neurodevelopment-by-age- 3.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b04ab78-ce95-4d97-80a0-0729b928838d Thu, 26 Oct 2023 06:58:00 -0400 Does the timing of prenatal exposure to corticosteroids and β2-agonists impact a child's neurodevelopment by age 3?
健康饮食可能是降低慢性阻塞性肺病风险的关键因素饮食质量与慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）发病率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Healthy-eating-may-be-a-key-player-in-COPD-risk-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Healthy-eating-may-be-a-key-player-in-COPD-risk-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84089ec5-0112-4e2b-8fe1-050f59e3fb27 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 06:40:00 -0400 Healthy eating may be a key player in COPD risk reduction
对于急性心肌梗塞患者，在标准治疗中添加中药复方是否可以改善预后？研究人员调查了中药复方通心络是否可以改善 ST 段抬高型心肌梗死患者的临床结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/In-acute-myocardial-infarction-病人-does-adding-a-traditional-Chinese-medicine-compound-to-standard-treatments-improve-outcomes。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/In-acute-myocardial-infarction-病人-does-adding-a-traditional-Chinese-medicine-compound-to-standard-treatments-improve-outcomes。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=460579bb-410e-4226-a699-3cc90d4dae40 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 06:38:00 -0400 In acute myocardial infarction patients, does adding a traditional Chinese medicine compound to standard treatments improve outcomes?
与男性相比，拉杰沙希的已婚女性患抑郁症的比例更高孟加拉国拉杰沙希市已婚成年人抑郁症相关的性别因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Married-women-in-Rajshahi-show-higher-rates-of-depression-compared-to-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Married-women-in-Rajshahi-show-higher-rates-of-depression-compared-to-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ecc901f-b732-4dd0-b7ad-d56a3f1ff971 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 06:15:00 -0400 Married women in Rajshahi show higher rates of depression compared to men
新赛多利斯数字手册为每位科学家带来先进流式细胞术的力量Sartorius 是先进细胞分析仪器行业领先的创新者，发布了第一本《高级流式细胞术手册》，作为 iQue® 高级高通量流式细胞术平台上的检测和工作流程的综合数字指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-Sartorius-Digital-Handbook-brings-the-power-of-advanced-flow-cytometry-to-every-scientist.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-Sartorius-Digital-Handbook-brings-the-power-of-advanced-flow-cytometry-to-every-scientist.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bff8139-fa73-44c1-add5-6fe842d77e6a Thu, 26 Oct 2023 03:56:00 -0400 New Sartorius Digital Handbook brings the power of advanced flow cytometry to every scientist
从珠穆朗玛峰到您的肝脏：“永久化学物质”对我们的环境和健康的影响令人震惊研究论文对全氟烷基物质和多氟烷基物质 (PFAS) 进行了全面综述，探讨了它们的环境流行率、人类暴露风险和肝脏毒性。该研究强调了 PFAS 研究中的紧迫差距，并呼吁进行更多研究，以更好地了解这些“永久化学物质”及其对人类健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/From-Mount-Everest-to-your-liver-The-alarming-reach-of-forever-chemicals-in-our-environment-and-health。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/From-Mount-Everest-to-your-liver-The-alarming-reach-of-forever-chemicals-in-our-environment-and-health。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2695463f-94bd-4a6d-9d62-4fb44de21f62 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 00:00:00 -0400 From Mount Everest to your liver: The alarming reach of 'forever chemicals' in our environment and health
研究发现行业向肿瘤学家支付的费用与不推荐的癌症治疗之间存在联系《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项美国研究发现，肿瘤科医生从行业获得报酬的癌症患者似乎更有可能接受一些非推荐和低价值的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-finds-link- Between-industry- payments-to-oncologies-and-non-recommished-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-finds-link- Between-industry- payments-to-oncologies-and-non-recommished-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0cd388a-6066-4416-bc93-89a9bc174d26 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 23:43:44 -0400 Study finds link between industry payments to oncologists and non-recommended cancer treatments
斯坦福大学化学家发现了蛋白质降解的新途径，为新疗法打开了大门当针对引起或传播疾病的问题蛋白质时，药物通常会堵塞蛋白质的活性位点，使其无法发挥作用并造成严重破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Stanford-chemists-uncover-new-pathway-for- Protein-degradation-opening-door-to-new-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Stanford-chemists-uncover-new-pathway-for- Protein-degradation-opening-door-to-new-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c1673b7-9cbd-45ce-9766-3a18a78ae8eb Wed, 25 Oct 2023 23:37:46 -0400 Stanford chemists uncover new pathway for protein degradation, opening door to new therapeutics
用铁和锰促进大脑健康：预防认知能力下降的饮食防御最近发表在《营养》杂志上的研究探讨了西班牙老年人膳食矿物质摄入量与认知障碍之间的联系，发现增加铁和锰的摄入量可以显着降低女性认知障碍的风险，但对男性没有影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Boosting-brain-health-with-iron-and-manganese-A-dietary-defense-against-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Boosting-brain-health-with-iron-and-manganese-A-dietary-defense-against-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edae8639-0abf-4886-972d-d8ae00ea271d Wed, 25 Oct 2023 23:33:00 -0400 Boosting brain health with iron and manganese: A dietary defense against cognitive decline
新发现的小分子可以抑制动物模型中乳腺癌和卵巢癌的生长贝勒医学院的研究人员发现了一种名为 5D4 的小分子，可以在动物模型中抑制乳腺癌和卵巢癌的生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Newly-identified-small-molecule-can-suppress-growth-of-breast-and-ovarian-cancers-in-animal-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Newly-identified-small-molecule-can-suppress-growth-of-breast-and-ovarian-cancers-in-animal-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad648b4f-1c80-4940-b13f-4d663950ec28 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 23:12:15 -0400 Newly identified small molecule can suppress growth of breast and ovarian cancers in animal models
